name: Brick Building Bears!
blurb: BRICK BUILDING is coming to Secret Bear World!

rewards.reward: BABY BEAR REWARD ========================= Thank you beary much for supporting our dream! Your name or your character\u2019s name will be permanently displayed on a jewel in the Treasure Room of the Ice Castle in Secret Bear World as recognition of your Kickstarter backer status!

EARLY GOLD BEAR REWARD ========================= Specially for early backers only! Premium Gold Card (Gold level gameplay on SecretBearWorld.com without any additional future costs) plus in celebration of our upcoming Brick Building theme, you will receive an exclusive GOLD BRICK (virtual item)! We will deliver the Premium Gold Card to you BEFORE our Kickstarter campaign ends, ensuring that you have this before Christmas 2013! This limited price point is only available for the first backers of BRICK BUILDING BEARS! Includes all previous rewards.

GOLD BEAR REWARD ========================= Premium Gold Card (Gold level gameplay on SecretBearWorld.com without any additional future costs) plus in celebration of our upcoming Brick Building theme, you will receive an exclusive GOLD BRICK (virtual item)! We will deliver the Premium Gold Card to you BEFORE our Kickstarter campaign ends, ensuring that you have this before Christmas 2013! Includes all previous rewards.

MOSHI BEAR REWARD ========================= Custom designed Moshi Bear plus the above rewards! Moshi Bears are small collectible replicas of the bears in Secret Bear World. You may wish to save your Moshi Bear as a collectible or your child may wish to add the Moshi Bear to their LEGO collection. Moshi Bears are not LEGO minifigures though your child may use Moshi Bears in their building sets. This reward is for the HONEY BEAR Moshi Bear. Includes all previous rewards. Free shipping to USA. (Add $10 for international shipping)

EARLY NINJA BEAR REWARD ========================= Special limited price only available for the first backers of BRICK BUILDING BEARS! Everybody wants to be a Ninja Bear! Wear this very cool Ninja Bear T-shirt and show your love for Secret Bear World! Choice of 5 T-shirt colors. Child and Adult sizes available. Includes all previous rewards. Free shipping to USA. (Add $10 for international shipping)

NINJA BEAR REWARD ========================= Everybody wants to be a Ninja Bear! Wear this very cool Ninja Bear T-shirt and show your love for Secret Bear World! Choice of 5 T-shirt colors. Child and Adult sizes available. Includes all previous rewards. Free shipping to USA. (Add $10 for international shipping)

SUPER BEAR REWARD ========================= The ultimate Superhero costume (Cape, Mask, and Power Bands) exclusively designed for Secret Bear World! We would love your feedback on how the final design should look like. So if you back the Super Bear Reward, you will be part of the design team! Child and Adult sizes available. Plus the virtual Superhero costume (Cape and Mask) for your Bear to wear in SecretBearWorld.com! Includes all previous rewards. Free shipping to USA. (Add $10 for international shipping)

ROYAL BEAR REWARD ========================= We will design a customized Bear avatar for you to play with in Secret Bear World. You may decide to base your avatar on your own photo or child's photo or just tell us how you want your character to look like. Includes all previous rewards.

DREAM BEAR REWARD ========================= Dreaming about your Bear playing in the Ice Castle just got better with the exclusive Secret Bear World bedding set of Duvet Cover and Pillow Case! Duvet cover available in King, Queen, and Twin size. Pillow case available in Standard size. Includes all previous rewards. Free shipping to USA. (Add $10 for international shipping)

GAME DESIGNER BEAR REWARD ========================= Invitation to join our Game Design team where all of your game design ideas will be considered and may be placed into the Secret Bear World game (providing the game concept remains true to our game design)! You may work with our development team via Skype or come to Vancouver (Sorry, travel expenses are not covered but our Game Producer will buy dinner for you at a 5 Star restaurant!). Includes all previous rewards. Free shipping worldwide.
